com.mindfusion.scheduling.model

Class Appointment

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mindfusion.scheduling.model.Item
      • com.mindfusion.scheduling.model.Appointment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable

    public class Appointment
extends Item
implements java.lang.Cloneable
    The Appointment class represents appointments within a schedule.

      Initializes a new instance of the Appointment class.

    • Method Detail

      • clone

        public Appointment clone()
        Description copied from class: Appointment
        Creates an exact shallow clone of this appointment.

        The Appointment.clone() method creates an exact copy of an item with the following exceptions. The duplicates of a recurring item created through the Appointment.clone() method are no longer recurring items. The Id of the newly created item is unique and not the same as the Id of the source item.

        Specified by:
        clone in class Item
        Returns:
        A new Appointment object representing a shallow copy of this one.

      • saveTo

        public void saveTo(org.w3c.dom.Element element,
                   XmlSerializationContext context)
        Description copied from class: Appointment
        Saves the appointment data to an XML document.

        This method saves the appointment's fields as elements of an XML document, from which they can be loaded later via the Appointment.loadFrom(Element, XmlSerializationContext) method.

        Overrides:
        saveTo in class Item
        Parameters:
        element - Allows adding data to the XML document.
        context - The context object contains the file format revision number of the schedule being loaded. It also provides methods that facilitate reading and writing various data types from and to the XML document.

      • loadFrom

        public void loadFrom(org.w3c.dom.Element element,
                     XmlSerializationContext context)
        Description copied from class: Appointment
        Loads appointment data from an XML document.

        Loads the appointment's fields from an XML document where they were stored by a previous call to the Appointment.saveTo(Element, XmlSerializationContext) method.

        Overrides:
        loadFrom in class Item
        Parameters:
        element - Allows reading data from the XML document.
        context - The context object contains the file format revision number of the schedule being loaded. It also provides methods that facilitate reading and writing various data types from and to the XML document.

      • getAllDayEvent

        public boolean getAllDayEvent()
        Description copied from class: Appointment
        Gets a value indicating whether the appointment is an all-day event.

        All day events are displayed in a special header area when the Calendar displays a timetable view.

        Specified by:
        getAllDayEvent in class Item
        Returns:

      • getReminder

        public Reminder getReminder()
        Description copied from class: Appointment
        Gets the reminder for this appointment.

        If the reminder type is Exact, the itemReminderTriggered event is raised at the time set in the reminder's Time property. If the reminder type is Leading, the itemReminderTriggered event is raised certain amount of time prior to the item's StartTime, as specified in the reminder's TimeInterval property.

        Note: Recurring items cannot have leading reminders.

        Specified by:
        getReminder in class Item
        Returns:
        An instance of the Reminder class.

      • setReminder

        public void setReminder(Reminder value)
        Description copied from class: Appointment
        Sets the reminder for this appointment.

        If the reminder type is Exact, the itemReminderTriggered event is raised at the time set in the reminder's Time property. If the reminder type is Leading, the itemReminderTriggered event is raised certain amount of time prior to the item's StartTime, as specified in the reminder's TimeInterval property.

        Note: Recurring items cannot have leading reminders.

        Specified by:
        setReminder in class Item
        Parameters:
        value - An instance of the Reminder class.

      • getPointedStyle

        public Style getPointedStyle()
        Description copied from class: Appointment
        Gets the style associated with this appointment.

        This style is applied to the appointment when it is pointed with the mouse. This property is ignored and Style is used instead of it when UseExtendedStyles is set to false.

        Specified by:
        getPointedStyle in class Item
        Returns:
        An instance of the Style class that defines the appearance of the item.

      • getPointedSelectedStyle

        public Style getPointedSelectedStyle()
        Description copied from class: Appointment
        Gets the style associated with this appointment.

        This style is applied to the appointment when it is pointed with the mouse and selected at the same time. This property is ignored and SelectedStyle is used instead of it when UseExtendedStyles is set to false.

        Specified by:

        Returns:

      • getVisible

        public boolean getVisible()
        Description copied from class: Appointment
        Gets whether the appointment is visible or not.

        Invisible items are not drawn at all. You could use this property to hide an item temporarily, or to store additional data in a helper item object that always stays invisible.

        Specified by:
        getVisible in class Item
        Returns:
        true if the item is visible; otherwise, false. The default is true.

      • setVisible

        public void setVisible(boolean value)

        Specified by:
        setVisible in class Item
        Parameters:
